Headline: රනිල්ට එරෙහිව එජාපයෙන් විශ්වාස භංගයක් ?
News Content:
අගමැති රනිල් වික්‍රමසිංහ මහතාට එරෙහිව විශ්වාසභංග යෝජනාවක් ගෙන ඒමට එජාප මන්ත්‍රී කණ්ඩායමක් 
සූදානමින් සිටින බව 





එක්සත් ජාතික පක්ෂ රාජ්‍ය ඇමැති පාලිත රංගේ බන්ඩාර මහතා ඊයේ (26) සඳහන් කර තිබුණි.

රනිල්ට එරෙහිව එක්සත් ජාතික පක්ෂයේ නායකත්වයේ වෙනසක් කළ යුතුයි. එජාපයේද පුර්ණ වෙනසක් සිදු කළ යුතුයි. මෙය ආණ්ඩුවේ පුත්තලමේ ජනතාවගේ හඬ නොවෙයි. ශ්‍රී ලංකාව පුරාම ඉන්න එක්සත් ජාතික පාක්ෂිකයන්ගේ හඬ බවද ඇමතිවරයා වැඩිදුරටත් සඳහන් කළේය.

I have no special interest on ranil or any other Sri Lankan politician, but I still follow the political situation in Sri Lanka. Therefore, for my understanding, Mahinda and the pohottu gang trying mainly to wipe out Ranil from Sri Lankan politics. In addition to them, some people like Range Bandara, Wasantha Senanayake and few others have the same intention. Wasantha Senanayake was someone who joined Mahinda to strengthen his hands, so it's clearly understandable what he needs again. Range Bandara was at some points trying to cross over to Mahinda's team during his era. At least he was visiting Mahinda in temple trees with his whole family. As Range Bandara is still the same Range Bandara, his intention is also quite clear. So, the question is that, are these guys really fighting for general public's benefits? Or their own benefits? For my understanding is that they fight for their own benefits. By changing the leader or crossing over to another side, these guys only expect some extra happiness for them, not for us. Therefore, why should we be so happy when these guys make these controversial comments to media about getting rid of Ranil or anybody else? Anybody got an answer?
